variants.Description in input context: E46K mutation increases the propensity of β-synuclein to fibrillize, but this effect was less than that of the A53T mutation.
The A53T mutation has a greater effect than E46K, underscoring the importance of protein microenvironment.
Mutation of Glu83 to a Lys or Ala increased polymerization but perturbed some of the properties of mature amyloid.
